Tropical Cat Dreamscape

A Lo-Fi Escape by StudioRich

StudioRich Blog / February 24, 2025

Tags: cats , cinematic-lofi , lofi , lofi-dreams , lofihouse , synth

Tropical Cat Dreamscape: A Lo-Fi Escape by StudioRich

Sometimes, all you need is a cat in sunglasses and a beat that refuses to leave your head. Tropical Cat Dreamscape isn’t so much a playlist as it is a vacation you forgot you booked. Jungle-toned pads. MIDI marimbas. Laser-washed hi-hats. All purring in sync.

Built as a companion to our digital zine, this mix blends feline memes with VHS aesthetic to create something that shouldn’t work — but absolutely does.

Recommended listening: hammock, coconut water, and an indoor fan set to max.
